areasOfImprovement: Could improve on system design knowledge
feedback: John demonstrated exceptional frontend skills during the interview. His React knowledge is advanced and he was able to solve complex UI challenges efficiently. While he lacks some backend experience, his willingness to learn and strong fundamentals make him a good candidate.

strengths: Good knowledge of both frontend and backend
feedback: Jane has a well-rounded skill set covering both frontend and backend technologies. She demonstrated good understanding of system architecture and microservices. Her testing methodology needs improvement, but overall she has the technical skills required for the position.

strengths: Excellent knowledge of Kubernetes and Docker
feedback: Robert is an outstanding DevOps engineer with deep expertise in cloud technologies and automation. His knowledge of containerization and orchestration is exceptional. While he's not as strong on the frontend, this isn't critical for the role he's applying for.
